name: Falling Floor
description:
Short Story: 

The sword man finds himself on a treacherous journey through floors that endlessly fall beneath his feet. With each step, he must use his skill with a sword to defend against dangerous foes and survive. He battles on, determined to reach the end of the falling floors and emerge as the victor.

Controls:

  • WASD -> Move
  • Joystick (not stable, rot recommend)

Rules:

  • Beware of the floor that is about to fall by move to others
  • Floor fall rate depend on time
  • If fall you die and death count increase (Press Restart)

Play now
